data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

The Gambling industry is now partnering with leagues, franchises, players, and networks. It is also now legal to bet on sports in 38 states and the District of Columbia, with active legislation in 6 states. (Schlachter, CNN, 2024) Sports betting alone brought in billions of dollars last year. Betting can be done in fun, however, if not managed in a healthy way it can lead to compulsive gambling disorder which is a mental health illness under addictions. If you or someone you know are struggling with sports betting, text 988. #sports #mentalhealth #athletes #sportsfan #traumatherapy
